snippet: The Nobel Foundation announced that it is reducing the size of its prizes by 20 percent, to about $1.1 million from $1.4 million.
abstract: The Nobel Foundation announced that it is reducing the size of its prizes by 20 percent, to about $1.1 million from $1.4 million.

headline.main: For Nobel Winners, a Smaller Cash Prize
headline.print_headline: Nobel Cash Reward Shrinks 20%, to $1.1 Million
